byline.original: By JEREMY W. PETERS and BARRY MEIER

abstract: Kentucky Sen Rand Paul clarifies earlier comments on childhood vaccination by saying vaccines are not harmful; he was member of Assn of American Physicians and Surgeons, which lobbied for state laws permitting parents to not vaccinate their children based on their beliefs.
lead_paragraph: The senator, who adjusted course Tuesday and said vaccines were not harmful, was a member of the Association of American Physicians and Surgeons.

headline.main: Rand Paul Is Linked to Doctors’ Group That Supports Vaccination Challenges
headline.print_headline: Paul Is Linked to Group of Doctors Supporting Vaccination Challenges

snippet: The senator, who adjusted course Tuesday and said vaccines were not harmful, was a member of the Association of American Physicians and Surgeons.

keywords.value: Assn of American Physicians and Surgeons
keywords.name: organizations
